import React, {useState,useContext} from 'react' import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { AuthContext } from '../context/AuthContext' function ArticlesItem(props){ const auth = useContext(AuthContext) if (auth.isAuthenticated){ return( <>
